summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5407 for the improvement of West 85th Street, from the West margin of 32nd Avenue Northwest to 31st Avenue Northwest; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 67395, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
